author: Fextralife
description:
Carbon FIRST LOOK Gameplay Preview - Sci-fi RPG on KICKSTARTER (LAST DAYS)
In this Fextralife video. We're going to be taking a look at Carbon, which is a Sci-fi RPG that is currently on Kickstarter. It kind of reminds me a bit of a combination of something like Cyberpunk, Path of Exile, and Contra. If you kind of like mash them all into one game, or if they had a baby, that's kind of what you're looking at when you see the gameplay of this game.
